t: Matthew 18
The Greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven
At*p that time the disciples came to Jesus and asked, “Who, then, is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?”
He*p called a little child to him, and placed the child among them.
And he said: “Truly*r I*r tell*r you,*r unless*r you*r change*r and*r become*r like*r little*r children,*r you*r will*r never*r enter*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven.*r

And*r whoever*r welcomes*r one*r such*r child*r in*r my*r name*r welcomes*r me.*r

The Parable of the Unmerciful Servant
Then*p Peter came to Jesus and asked, “Lord, how many times shall I forgive my brother or sister who sins against me? Up to seven times?”

As*r he*r began*r the*r settlement,*r a*r man*r who*r owed*r him*r ten*r thousand*r bags*r of*r gold*r was*r brought*r to*r him.*r
